title: Vernon, Florida with Dr. Becky Hines!
description:
True Story (and Don't Ask Tig) celebrity Dr. Becky Hines joins Tig and Cheryl on today's VERY Floridian episode! With Cheryl in Florida visiting relatives, Dr. Becky sits in to discuss Vernon, Florida, a look at the very strange residents of a town in panhandle Florida. Plus Dr. Becky Hines answers all of Tig's questions about what it's like to be a part of True Story lore! *this episode spills beans* (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
